verses.text: Righteous \add art\add* thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I plead with thee: yet let me talk with thee of \add thy\add* judgments : Wherefore doth the way of the wicked prosper ? \add wherefore\add* are all they happy that deal very treacherously ?\f + \fr 12.1 \ft talk…: or, reason the case with thee\f*

Thou hast planted them, yea, they have taken root : they grow , yea, they bring forth fruit : thou \add art\add* near in their mouth , and far from their reins.\f + \fr 12.2 \ft they grow: Heb. they go on\f*

But thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, knowest me: thou hast seen me, and tried mine heart toward thee: pull them out like sheep for the slaughter , and prepare them for the day of slaughter.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft toward…: Heb. with thee\f*

How long shall the land mourn , and the herbs of every field wither , for the wickedness of them that dwell therein? the beasts are consumed , and the birds ; because they said , He shall not see our last end. \p

¶ If thou hast run with the footmen , and they have wearied thee, then how canst thou contend with horses ? and \add if\add* in the land of peace , \add wherein\add* thou trustedst , \add they wearied thee\add*, then how wilt thou do in the swelling of Jordan ?

For even thy brethren , and the house of thy father , even they have dealt treacherously with thee; yea, they have called a multitude after thee: believe them not, though they speak fair words unto thee.\f + \fr 12.6 \ft they have called…: or, they cried after thee fully\f*\f + \fr 12.6 \ft fair…: Heb. good things\f* \p
¶ I have forsaken mine house , I have left mine heritage ; I have given the dearly beloved of my soul into the hand of her enemies.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft the dearly…: Heb. the love\f*
Mine heritage is unto me as a lion in the forest ; it crieth out against me: therefore have I hated it.\f + \fr 12.8 \ft crieth…: or, yelleth: Heb. giveth out his voice\f*

Mine heritage \add is\add* unto me \add as\add* a speckled bird , the birds round about \add are\add* against her; come ye, assemble all the beasts of the field , come to devour.\f + \fr 12.9 \ft speckled: or, taloned\f*\f + \fr 12.9 \ft come to: or, cause them to come to\f*
Many pastors have destroyed my vineyard , they have trodden my portion under foot , they have made my pleasant portion a desolate wilderness.\f + \fr 12.10 \ft pleasant…: Heb. portion of desire\f*
They have made it desolate , \add and being\add* desolate it mourneth unto me; the whole land is made desolate , because no man layeth \add it\add* to heart.

The spoilers are come upon all high places through the wilderness : for the sword of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall devour from the \add one\add* end of the land even to the \add other\add* end of the land : no flesh shall have peace.

They have sown wheat , but shall reap thorns : they have put themselves to pain , \add but\add* shall not profit : and they shall be ashamed of your revenues because of the fierce anger of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.13 \ft they shall: or, ye shall\f* \p

¶ Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* against all mine evil neighbours , that touch the inheritance which I have caused my people Israel to inherit ; Behold, I will pluck them out of their land , and pluck out the house of Judah from among them.
And it shall come to pass, after that I have plucked them out I will return , and have compassion on them, and will bring them again , every man to his heritage , and every man to his land.

And it shall come to pass, if they will diligently learn the ways of my people , to swear by my name , The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* liveth ; as they taught my people to swear by Baal ; then shall they be built in the midst of my people.
But if they will not obey , I will utterly pluck up and destroy that nation , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
